s = input()
t = input()

if s == t:
    print("Yes")
else:
    for i in range(len(s)):
        s = s[-1] + s[:-1]
        if s == t:
            print("Yes")
            exit()
    print("No")

S = str(input())
T = str(input())

if S == T:
    print("Yes")
    exit()
for i in range(len(S)):
    S = S[-1] + S[:-1]  # 文字列の先頭の文字を末尾に移動させる
    if S == T:
        print("Yes")
        exit()
print("No")
#!/usr/bin/python3

from sys import stdin

s = stdin.readline().rstrip()
t = stdin.readline().rstrip()

for _ in range(len(s)):
    s = s[-1] + s[:-1]
    if s == t:
        print("Yes")
        exit()

print("No")

from sys import stdin

s = stdin.readline().rstrip()
t = stdin.readline().rstrip()

for _ in range(len(s)):
    s = s[-1] + s[:-1]
    if s == t:
        print("Yes")
        exit()

print("No")

S = str(input())
T = str(input())

if S == T:
    print("Yes")
    exit()
for i in range(len(S)-1):
    S = S[-1] + S[:-1]
    if S == T:
        print("Yes")
        exit()
print("No")

s = input()
t = input()

if s != t:
    for i in range(len(s)):
        s = s[-1] + s[:-1]
        if s == t:
            print("Yes")
            exit()
    print("No")
